statements: SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT warehouse_id, sku_description FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE rack_id > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT sku_id FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE demand_pattern = 'high';
SELECT sku_id, sku_description FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE rack_id = 3 ORDER BY sku_description DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, rack_id, sku_description FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id = 2 AND demand_pattern = 'low';
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_id = 1
SELECT sku_description, demand_pattern FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE rack_id = 2 ORDER BY sku_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT warehouse_id FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE sku_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND rack_id = 3
SELECT warehouse_id, rack_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM WarehouseLayout GROUP BY warehouse_id, rack_id
SELECT SUM(sku_id) AS total_sku_count FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE rack_id = 4
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE rack_id = 1;
SELECT warehouse_id, rack_id, sku_id, demand_rate FROM warehouse_layout WHERE demand_rate > 0.5;
SELECT item_name, item_category, item_size FROM sku_characteristics WHERE item_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT warehouse_id, rack_id, demand_rate FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY demand_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM sku_characteristics WHERE reorder_point < 10;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY demand_rate DESC, warehouse_id ASC
SELECT warehouse_id, sku_id, rack_id FROM warehouse_layout WHERE rack_id = 5 ORDER BY warehouse_id ASC
SELECT sku_id, item_name, item_category FROM sku_characteristics WHERE reorder_point > 50 ORDER BY sku_id ASC
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout INNER JOIN sku_characteristics ON warehouse_layout.sku_id = sku_characteristics.sku_id WHERE item_size >= 10 ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC
SELECT warehouse_id, rack_id, sku_id, demand_rate FROM warehouse_layout UNION SELECT sku_id, item_name, item_category, item_size FROM sku_characteristics ORDER BY demand_rate DESC, sku_id ASC
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT area_name, rack_id FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY warehouse_id DESC;
SELECT sku_name, category, weight FROM sku_characteristics WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT pattern_id, demand_rate FROM demand_patterns WHERE order_lead_time > 5 ORDER BY demand_rate DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, area_name, max_capacity FROM warehouse_layout WHERE rack_id = 1
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout WHERE warehouse_id = 1;
SELECT area_name, max_capacity FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY max_capacity DESC;
SELECT sku_name, category, weight FROM sku_characteristics WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT warehouse_id, area_name, rack_id, shelf_id FROM warehouse_layout WHERE rack_id IS NOT NULL AND shelf_id IS NULL;
SELECT sku_id, demand_rate, order_lead_time FROM demand_patterns WHERE order_lead_time > 5 ORDER BY demand_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout;
SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_location FROM WarehouseLayout;
SELECT * FROM SKUCharacteristics WHERE sku_description = 'High Demand';
SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_location FROM WarehouseLayout ORDER BY warehouse_name DESC;
SELECT warehouse_id, COUNT(*) AS total_allocations FROM StorageAllocation GROUP BY warehouse_id;
SELECT * FROM WarehouseLayout
SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_location FROM WarehouseLayout WHERE warehouse_location = 'New York'
SELECT sku_name, sku_description FROM SKUCharacteristics ORDER BY sku_name DESC

SELECT warehouse_name, warehouse_location, COUNT(*) AS total_allocations FROM WarehouseLayout INNER JOIN StorageAllocation ON WarehouseLayout.warehouse_id = StorageAllocation.warehouse_id GROUP BY warehouse_name, warehouse_location

SELECT sku_name, demand_date, demand_quantity FROM SKUCharacteristics INNER JOIN DemandPatterns ON SKUCharacteristics.sku_id = DemandPatterns.sku_id WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY demand_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout;
SELECT category, product_name, dimensions FROM sku_characteristics WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT demand, month FROM demand_patterns WHERE demand_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY demand DESC;
SELECT location_id, quantity FROM storage_allocation WHERE sku_id = 5 AND quantity > 0;
SELECT date, action FROM allocation_history WHERE quantity_changed < 0 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM warehouse_layout ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT sku_id, product_name, dimensions FROM sku_characteristics WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT demand_id, month, demand FROM demand_patterns WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY month ASC;
SELECT * FROM storage_allocation WHERE quantity >= 50 AND quantity < 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC, location_id ASC;
SELECT a.allocation_id, a.date, a.action, s.product_name FROM allocation_history a JOIN sku_characteristics s ON a.allocation_id = s.sku_id ORDER BY date DESC;
